name: Vanilla Chocolate Strawberry
description: Vanilla ice cream. Chocolate ice cream. Strawberry ice cream. All in one!? Oh my! The Breyers® take on the classic Neopolitan ice cream is the best of 3 worlds! Our Signature Natural Vanilla, Chocolate and Strawberry ice creams come together in one delicious package. Whether one at a time or all three in a scoop, there’s something for everyone!

name: Delights Cookies & Cream
description: Now you can indulge without all the guilt! Who knew that a whole pint of Cookies and Cream ice cream was 330 calories, and tasted delicious too...we did! That's because here at Breyers®, we have over 150 years of experience making mouth-watering ice cream. We start with high quality ingredients, naturally sourced flavors, and all American dairy. This low fat ice cream will leave your taste buds in disbelief. And it’s even a good source of protein!

name: CarbSmart™ Vanilla
description: Watching your grams of sugar or carbs? Try our Breyers® CarbSmart™ Creamy Vanilla, with 110 calories, 4g net carbs, 4g sugar, and 4g fiber+ per serving! Sometimes, you just need a treat that you can grab and go and maybe even eat in four bites!

name: Lactose Free Vanilla
description: Have a lactose sensitivity? No problem! Try our Breyers® Lactose Free Vanilla! It’s the same great vanilla, just without the lactose*!

name: No Sugar Added Vanilla
description: Simply delicious and satisfying. Breyers® No Sugar Added Vanilla is a great way to enjoy dessert time, without all the guilt. It’s the vanilla you love and expect from Breyers®, without sugar – what can be sweeter? Your sweet tooth can indulge in the smooth, creamy vanilla that has just the perfect amount of sweet.

name: OREO® & CHIPS AHOY!® 2in1
description: OREO® or CHIPS AHOY!® cookies? With Breyers® 2in1 you don't have to choose! You can get the best of both worlds - vanilla Breyers® loaded with pieces of REAL OREO® cookies, swirled together with caramel Breyers® AND pieces of REAL CHIPS AHOY!® cookies. It’s sure to be your new favorite dessert.

name: Vanilla Caramel
description: Torn between sweet or salty for dessert? Give in to the perfect balance between the two in Breyers® Vanilla Caramel. A classic blend of rich vanilla and indulgent caramel. It’s our signature Breyers® Natural Vanilla ice cream with a luscious caramel swirl. What can be better?

name: Vanilla Caramel Gelato Indulgences

name: Peach
description: Breyers® Peach - real juicy peach pieces mixed into creamy vanilla. A genuine taste of summer sweetness all year round!

name: CarbSmart™ Peanut Butter
description: Breyers® CarbSmart™ proves that fewer carbs doesn't mean less taste. Make sweeter family moments while keeping carb-watchers happy by the bar or by the scoop. Treat yourself to a scoop of Breyers® CarbSmart™ Peanut Butter —5 grams of net carbs+ and 130 calories per serving!

name: Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter
description: Love ice cream but can’t stomach the dairy? Have no fear! Breyers® Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter is here! Made with real almond milk and filled with luscious swirls of real peanut butter – there’s no milk in sight. If you’re anything like us, you love Breyers® vanilla and spoonfuls of peanut butter. So why not combine your love into one tub with Breyers® Non-Dairy Vanilla Peanut Butter? And now, even those who usually shy away from delicious ice cream can rejoice and join in! Really, who can say there’s ever too much of a good thing – like peanut butter and Non-Dairy Breyers®? Rich, creamy vanilla goodness surrounds those beautiful swirls of peanut butter and will be sure to bring a smile to your face.

name: REESE'S & REESE'S PIECES 2in1
description: REESE'S PIECES or REESE'S Peanut Butter Cups? When it comes to your favorite REESE'S candy, you don’t have to choose with Breyers® 2in1s. You can get the best of both REESE'S filled worlds – peanut butter Breyers® loaded with pieces of 100% REAL REESE'S Peanut Butter Cups, swirled together with chocolate Breyers® and loads of REAL REESE'S PIECES Mini Candies. It’s sure to be your new favorite dessert.

name: SNICKERS®
description: Breyers® joins forces with America’s favorite candy bar to bring you Breyers® SNICKERS®! Caramel ribbons, chocolate coated peanuts, and real SNICKERS® bar pieces are swirled together with smooth vanilla Breyers® for a dessert that can’t be beat.

name: SNICKERS® & M&M'S® 2in1
description: SNICKERS® or M&M'S®? When it comes to your favorite candy SNICKERS®, and your other favorite candy M&M'S®, you don’t have to choose with New Breyers® 2in1s. Now you can get the best of both worlds – caramel Breyers® loaded with pieces of REAL SNICKERS®, swirled together with chocolate Breyers® and heaps of REAL M&M'S® MINIS Milk Chocolate Candies. It’s sure to be your new favorite dessert.

name: No Sugar Added Butter Pecan
description: Simply delicious vanilla with butter roasted pecans. Breyers® No Sugar Added Butter Pecan is a great way to enjoy dessert time, without all the guilt. It’s the vanilla you love and expect from Breyers® plus chunks of butter roasted pecans, without sugar – what can be sweeter? Your sweet tooth can indulge in the smooth, creamy vanilla that has just the perfect amount of sweet.

name: Butter Pecan

name: OREO® Snack Cups 10ct

name: Creamsicle

name: New York Style Cheesecake

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
description: With creamy vanilla and chunks of cookie dough, Breyers® Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is sure to satisfy any craving! Less bake time, more play time! Chunks of chewy chocolate chip cookie dough folded into Breyers® creamy vanilla make Breyers® Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough a chunky, chewy taste-bud pleaser.

name: Non-Dairy OREO® Cookies & Cream

name: Chocolate Chip

description: This Layer was inspired by one of our favorite desserts – parfaits. It’s well-balanced and has a warm and satisfying taste that we are obsessed with. We start with Black Raspberry gelato which is crafted with black raspberry puree that comes from a farm in the Pacific Northwest. Next, we add oat crisps (which are similar to a crunchy oatmeal cookie) and a third layer of Blueberry sauce which is made from all-American blueberries. Finally we add a fourth layer of vanilla gelato and a fifth layer of oat crisps. We think this Black Raspberry Vanilla Parfait is the perfect dessert!
